name: Magic of the Light Switch
description:
Created for the 2022 Global Game Jam.

Use the power of the light switch to magically read minds and discover who stole your sandwich in this 2D point and click mystery. Some villain in your office has stolen your sandwich for the last time! You, Gothdor will use your magic to read the minds of your coworkers to find the thief. However, your powers only work in the dark, where you can't see. Use the powers of light and dark (the light switch) in order to find the culprit. When the lights turn on, keep track of everyone in the room. When the lights go off, read the random thoughts to discover who stole your sandwich. When the lights turn back on, use your mouse to click who you think is the thief.
